member.name: M:Microsoft.ProgramSynthesis.Extraction.Json.Learning.Witnesses.LearnAllGeneralizedPaths(Microsoft.ProgramSynthesis.Wrangling.Json.JsonRegion,Microsoft.ProgramSynthesis.Wrangling.Json.JsonRegion,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Learn all possible paths from to . This method is different from : it generalizes the paths to the destination while the other method only finds concrete paths to the destination.
member.param: Indicates whether we learn a sequence or a region.
